bike.description: 700 Series OCLV Carbon, KVF (Kammtail Virtual Foil) tube shape, E2, BB90, internal cable routing, DuoTrap compatible, Ride Tuned seatmast

Cane Creek AER upper, cartridge bearing lower, sealed, 1-1/8" top, 1.5" bottom
